title: Redwood National and State Parks: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases       Recent Park News          Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 15, 2016  Economic Impacts of National Park Visitation Increase  Today, at the peak of the summer season in 2016, Redwood National and State Parks is experiencing visitation equal to or greater than 2015 and park managers expect the trend to continue. Visitation to Redwood National Park alone in 2015 generated $33 million in non-local spending and directly supported 530 jobs.   June 24, 2016  Rellim Ridge Trail Now Open to Bicycles  Bicyclists now have the opportunity to connect Howland Hill Road in Jedediah Smith Redwoods State Park with Hamilton Road in Del Norte Coast Redwoods State Park.            News Archive Looking for the official word on past events? You'll find them on our News Archive page.
